article_title: Surgeon says Gaza 'like an atomic bomb has dropped'
sentence: Last  year  Hamas  gunmen  attacked  Israel  on  7  October  last  year,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  as  hostages.

article_title: Surgeon says Gaza 'like an atomic bomb has dropped'
sentence: Israel  then  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  that  has  now  killed  a  total  of  41,689  people,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
